name: safecmd
description: SAFE Network command line application (CLI) boilerplate example

scripts.build: mkdir -p ./dist/prod && cp -R node_modules ./dist/prod && pkg -t node8-linux-x64 -o ./dist/prod/safecmd cli.js
scripts.build-mock: mkdir -p ./dist/mock && cp -R node_modules ./dist/mock && pkg -t node8-linux-x64 -o ./dist/mock/safecmd cli.js
